title: ... the fuck is going on?
body:
7 (seven) ranked losses in a row, 5 of those at 0 LP. I have never had teams this absurdly bad, even in bronze at the beginning of the season. Even in my four thousand games of silver I had better teams. And I just hit gold? What now?

I just don't understand why I even queue anymore. Don't expect to win when I get stuck with games like this.

replies.body:
Winning sprees happen, losing sprees happen. Just roll with it.

A wise man once said:

> 40% of games you're going to lose, no matter what you do. Accept it and move on.
> 40% of games you're going to win, almost despite how bad you do. Be grateful for them and move on.
> The last 20% of games are where you really decide how the game pans out. Play your hardest in them to make them count.
this needs to put pinned at the top of the boards

Have you ever considered… it could maybe… just maybe… not be entirely their fault?
Or hey, you're secretly the best player in the world and we're all wrong and you're right.  Because even Challengers can make mistakes or not do perfectly.
*shrug*

Well, if I'm the issue, explain how. I think I play well -- of course I mess up sometimes, but generally I do well, and maintain a 4:1 average KDA (which means I don't feed, at the least). I know what needs to be done to win a game, but I very rarely have much followup from my team.

xD

But nah @OP i know what you mean dude. I had a 13 game losing streak in Plat.  

Oddly enough not to play the blame card, but my first 3 games consisted of someone going like 0-16 or first timing a champ, 

The next 3-4 games had someone afk at 3-4 minutes 

And the last 3 were complete throws. I was actually shocked at how bullshit my losses were.

I dont care if i lose, but i hate losing because someone is 0-15, or first timing a champ, or an AFK you know?

Sometimes you get those games but yeah what nep2une said. It could honestly just be you playing bad..
Luck. Also the bottom of each division holds about 80% of the players in that division, a lot of people that just hit Gold V celebrate it by trolling, feeding and making no effort at all.
Nice way of celebrating. >.> My first game in gold, I put in my all.
Maybe. But I have better stats than a lot of golds I've seen, so, I donno. If being gold means I need to literally 1v5 fed enemy teams, then yeah, I wasn't ready for that.
